body.p: None ought, nor is it possible that any should, maintain communion with Christ, & yet keep up fellowship with Devils

Sacrament day. 8. May. 1692 1.Cor. 10. 21.
Ye cannot drink the Cup of the Lord, & the cup of Devils: ye cannot be partakers of the Lords table, & of the Table of Devils.
Se these sermons in loose papers. 8vo.
